entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: pldz1/Browser_Proxy_Plugin: 🌐 Browser Proxy Plugin is a lightweight extension that lets users route web traffic through a proxy. It supports HTTP, HTTPS, and SOCKS proxies, offering a simple interface to manage proxy settings for improved privacy and access to restricted content.
entry.content: 🌐 Browser Proxy Plugin is a lightweight extension that lets users route web traffic through a proxy. It supports HTTP, HTTPS, and SOCKS proxies, offering a simple interface to manage proxy settings for improved privacy and access to restricted content.
